text: 2.9 Ais 64.4 Chɨn pen anɨgɨl agobun ak, takaw anɨb ak buk Baybol mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdeb. Anɨgɨl tɨkɨl agak, Tap okok binɨb wɨdɨn ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨlak ak, tɨmud ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨlak ak, gos ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨlak ak, tap teplep anɨb okok God ne dɨlɨtep gɨl, binɨb God nop mapen lɨpal okok kɨlop ñɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkak.
